title: LOOKING FOR DEDICATED SUPPORT PLAYER GOLD ++
body:
HEy GUys

Team vicious gamers Looking for a gold ++ support to join our team and develop and build friendships. we are a recently new team who enjoy the game. we are looking for someone who has good knowledge of the game but can still develop with the team and build teamwork, must have working mic and be able to use teamspeak and communicate with the team.

if you are interested then feel free too add me  posipi or leave a post and ill get back to you tonight. hope too see the right support soon

replies.body: plat 5 supp main. Season 4 p3 with diamond elo supp main.
i can try out if you want, mains; thresh, nami and braum.
ill try out if ya want
